#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
# define S(n) scanf("%d",&n)
# define SL(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
# define FOR(i,x,y) for(i=x;i<=y;i++)
#define rep(i,n) FOR(i,0,n-1)
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int t,sum,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
 S(t);
 while(t--)
 {
   S(x1);S(y1);S(x2);S(y2);
   S(x3);S(y3);S(x4);S(y4);
   sum=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1);
   sum+=(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
        x1=max(x1,x3);
        y1=max(y1,y3);
        x2=min(x2,x4);
        y2=min(y2,y4);
   if(y2>y1&&x2>x1)
   sum=sum-(x1-x2)*(y1-y2);
   printf("%d\n",sum);
 }
 return 0;
}
